Description: Section 37 HSWA prosecution of David Coulson as Director of Coulson Constructions North East Ltd for failing to ensure home occupants were not placed at risk of exposure to products of combustion from operational gas boiler that was unsafely venting into the occupied space of their home. The occupants were affected and suffered symptoms of carbon monoxide poisoning. In addition, credible risk of fire and explosion and electric shock as a result of unsafe construction activity.
